SQL_STMT_U.val:
select T0.CardCode, T0.CardName as 'Pemasok', T0.DocNum as 'No. Faktur', T1.ObjType, T0.NumAtCard as 'Referensi Faktur', T0.DocDate as 'Tanggal Faktur', T1.SumApplied as 'Nilai Faktur', T1.PaidSum as 'Nilai Pembayaran', T1.DocNumPayment as 'No. Pembayaran', T1.DocDate as 'Tanggal Pembayaran', T1.CounterRef as 'Referensi Pembayaran', concat ( case when T1.CashAcct = '' then '-' else T1.CashAcct end, '/', case when T1.TrsfrAcct = '' then '-' else T1.trsfracct end, '/', case when T1.CheckAcct = '' then '-' else T1.CheckAcct end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Account', concat ( case when T3.acctName = '' or T3.AcctName is null then '-' else T3.acctName end, '/', case when T2.acctName = '' or T2.AcctName is null then '-' else T2.acctName end, '/', case when T4.acctName = '' or T4.AcctName is null then '-' else T4.acctName end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Name', T1.TrackNo as 'No. Jurnal', T1.Comments as 'Keterangan', '1' AS NUMBER from OPCH T0 (nolock) left join (select H.cardcode,H.CardName,H.DocNum as 'DocNumPayment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal,H.BcgSum, H.TrsfrAcct,H.CashAcct,H.CheckAcct,H.counterref,H.TrackNo,H.Comments, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, D.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry and T0.ObjType = T1.InvType left join OACT T2 on T1.TrsfrAcct = T2.AcctCode left join OACT T3 on T1.CashAcct = T3.AcctCode left join OACT T4 on T1.CheckAcct = T4.AcctCode left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode where ISNULL(:7,'') Like '%:4%' and :8 between ':2' and ':3' and :9 like '%:6%' and ISNULL(:10,'') Like '%:1%' AND TG.GroupCode = :5 AND T0.Canceled = 'N' AND t0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry
UNION ALL
select T0.CardCode, T0.CardName as 'Pemasok', NULL, 'SUBTOTAL', NULL, NULL, NULL, SUM(T1.PaidSum) as 'Nilai Pembayaran', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '1' from OPCH T0 (nolock) left join (select H.cardcode,H.CardName,H.DocNum as 'DocNumPayment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal,H.BcgSum, H.TrsfrAcct,H.CashAcct,H.CheckAcct,H.counterref,H.TrackNo,H.Comments, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, D.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry and T0.ObjType = T1.InvType left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode where ISNULL(:7,'') Like '%:4%' and :8 between ':2' and ':3' and :9 like '%:6%' and ISNULL(:10,'') Like '%:1%' AND TG.GroupCode = :5 AND T0.Canceled = 'N' AND t0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry Group By T0.CardCode,T0.CardName
UNION ALL
select NULL, 'TOTAL', NULL, 'TOTAL', NULL, NULL, NULL, SUM(T1.PaidSum) as 'Nilai Pembayaran', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '2' from OPCH T0 (nolock) left join (select H.cardcode,H.CardName,H.DocNum as 'DocNumPayment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal,H.BcgSum, H.TrsfrAcct,H.CashAcct,H.CheckAcct,H.counterref,H.TrackNo,H.Comments, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, D.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry and T0.ObjType = T1.InvType left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode where ISNULL(:7,'') Like '%:4%' and :8 between ':2' and ':3' and :9 like '%:6%' and ISNULL(:10,'') Like '%:1%' AND TG.GroupCode = :5 AND T0.Canceled = 'N' AND t0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry order by NUMBER,T0.CardCode,T1.ObjType,T0.DocNum,T0.DocDate

ExpSyntax.val: DStr({1,19},'DD MMMMMMMMMM YYYY')&' s/d '& DStr({1,20}, 'DD MMMMMMMMMM YYYY')

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select T0.CardCode, T0.CardName as 'Pemasok', T0.DocNum as 'No. Faktur', T1.ObjType, T0.NumAtCard as 'Referensi Faktur', T0.DocDate as 'Tanggal Faktur', T1.SumApplied as 'Nilai Faktur', T1.PaidSum as 'Nilai Pembayaran', T1.DocNumPayment as 'No. Pembayaran', T1.DocDate as 'Tanggal Pembayaran', T1.CounterRef as 'Referensi Pembayaran', concat ( case when T1.CashAcct = '' then '-' else T1.CashAcct end, '/', case when T1.TrsfrAcct = '' then '-' else T1.trsfracct end, '/', case when T1.CheckAcct = '' then '-' else T1.CheckAcct end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Account', concat ( case when T3.acctName = '' or T3.AcctName is null then '-' else T3.acctName end, '/', case when T2.acctName = '' or T2.AcctName is null then '-' else T2.acctName end, '/', case when T4.acctName = '' or T4.AcctName is null then '-' else T4.acctName end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Name', T1.TrackNo as 'No. Jurnal', T1.Comments as 'Keterangan', '1' AS NUMBER from OPCH T0 (nolock) left join (select H.cardcode,H.CardName,H.DocNum as 'DocNumPayment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal,H.BcgSum, H.TrsfrAcct,H.CashAcct,H.CheckAcct,H.counterref,H.TrackNo,H.Comments, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, D.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry and T0.ObjType = T1.InvType left join OACT T2 on T1.TrsfrAcct = T2.AcctCode left join OACT T3 on T1.CashAcct = T3.AcctCode left join OACT T4 on T1.CheckAcct = T4.AcctCode left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode where ISNULL(:7,'') Like '%:4%' and :8 between ':2' and ':3' and :9 like '%:6%' and ISNULL(:10,'') Like '%:1%' AND TG.GroupCode = :5 AND T0.Canceled = 'N' AND t0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry
UNION ALL
select T0.CardCode, T0.CardName as 'Pemasok', NULL, 'SUBTOTAL', NULL, NULL, NULL, SUM(T1.PaidSum) as 'Nilai Pembayaran', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '1' from OPCH T0 (nolock) left join (select H.cardcode,H.CardName,H.DocNum as 'DocNumPayment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal,H.BcgSum, H.TrsfrAcct,H.CashAcct,H.CheckAcct,H.counterref,H.TrackNo,H.Comments, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, D.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry and T0.ObjType = T1.InvType left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode where ISNULL(:7,'') Like '%:4%' and :8 between ':2' and ':3' and :9 like '%:6%' and ISNULL(:10,'') Like '%:1%' AND TG.GroupCode = :5 AND T0.Canceled = 'N' AND t0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry Group By T0.CardCode,T0.CardName
UNION ALL
select NULL, 'TOTAL', NULL, 'TOTAL', NULL, NULL, NULL, SUM(T1.PaidSum) as 'Nilai Pembayaran', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '2' from OPCH T0 (nolock) left join (select H.cardcode,H.CardName,H.DocNum as 'DocNumPayment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal,H.BcgSum, H.TrsfrAcct,H.CashAcct,H.CheckAcct,H.counterref,H.TrackNo,H.Comments, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, D.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry and T0.ObjType = T1.InvType left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode where ISNULL(:7,'') Like '%:4%' and :8 between ':2' and ':3' and :9 like '%:6%' and ISNULL(:10,'') Like '%:1%' AND TG.GroupCode = :5 AND T0.Canceled = 'N' AND t0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry order by NUMBER,T0.CardCode,T1.ObjType,T0.DocNum,T0.DocDate

select T3.CardCode as 'Supplier Code', T3.CardName as 'Supplier Name', T3.NumAtCard as 'Supplier Reference', T3.DocNum as 'GRPO Number', T3.DocDate as 'GRPO Date', --TW.DocNum as 'Return Number', --TW.DocDate as 'Return Date', --TW.NumAtCard as 'Return Reference', --TW.DocTotal as 'Total Return', TX.DocNum as 'Invoice Number', TX.DocDate as 'Invoice Date', TX.DocTotal as 'Total Invoice', TX.PaidToDate as 'Paid Amount', (TX.DocTotal - TX.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due', --TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', --TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', --TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', --TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', TZ.Number_Payment as 'Payment Number', TZ.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', TZ.DocDate as 'Payment Date', TZ.BcgSum as'Bank Charges', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Payment' from OPDN as T3 --left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocNum, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.DocDate, A.NumAtCard,A.DocCur, A.DocTotal -- from ORPD as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TW -- on T3.DocEntry = TW.BaseEntry and T3.ObjType = TW.BaseType left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.U_IDU_Kode_PT,A.DocNum, A.DocDate, A.DocCur, A.DocTotal, A.PaidToDate from OPCH as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TX on T3.DocEntry = TX.BaseEntry and T3.ObjType = TX.BaseType --left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocNum, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.DocDate, A.NumAtCard,A.DocCur, A.DocTotal -- from ORPC as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TY -- on TX.DocEntry = TY.BaseEntry and TX.ObjType = TY.BaseType left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal, H.BcgSum, D.DocNum, D.InvoiceId, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, D.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on TX.DocEntry = TZ.DocEntry and TX.ObjType = TZ.InvType where T3.NumAtCard=:4 and :1 between ':2' and ':3' and :6 = :7 and T3.CardCode = :5 order by T3.CardCode,TZ.Number_Payment,TZ.InvoiceId asc

select * from (select case when T0.DocNum is not null then concat('PO-',T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT,'-',cast(T0.DocNum as varchar(10))) else null end as 'PO Number', T0.DocDate as 'PO Date', T0.CardCode as 'Supplier Code', T0.CardName as 'Supplier Name', T0.DocCur as 'Currency', T0.DocTotal as 'Total PO', TA.NumAtCard as 'BL Number', TA.DocDate as 'BL Date', T3.DocNum as 'GRPO Number', T3.DocDate as 'GRPO Date', T3.DocTotal as 'Total GR', TX.U_IDU_Kode_PT as 'Consignee', case when TX.DocNum is not null then concat('INV-',T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT,'-',cast(TX.DocNum as varchar(10))) else null end as 'Invoice Number', TX.DocDate as 'Invoice Date', TX.DocCur as 'Invoice Currency', TX.DocTotal as 'Total Invoice', TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', Tz.Number_Payment as 'Payment Number', Tz.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', Tz.DocDate as 'Payment Date', TZ.BcgSum as'Bank Charges', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Payment', (Tx.DocTotal - Tx.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due' from OPOR as T0 left join (select distinct T1.BaseEntry, T1.DocEntry, T2.ObjType, T2.DocNum, T2.DocDate, T2.NumAtCard, T2.CANCELED, T2.LetterNum from PBL1 as T1 join OPBL as T2 on T1.DocEntry = T2.DocEntry) as TA on T0.DocEntry = TA.BaseEntry and TA.CANCELED = 'N' join TX_DOCREF as TB on TA.DocEntry = TB.BaseEntry and TA.ObjType = TB.BaseType join OPDN as T3 on T3.DocEntry = TB.DocEntry and T3.ObjType = TB.DocType and T3.CANCELED = 'N' right join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.U_IDU_Kode_PT,A.DocNum, A.DocDate, A.DocCur, A.DocTotal, A.PaidToDate from OPCH as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TX on T3.DocEntry = TX.BaseEntry and T3.ObjType = TX.BaseType left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocNum, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.DocDate, A.NumAtCard,A.DocCur, A.DocTotal from ORPC as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TY on TX.DocEntry = TY.BaseEntry and TX.ObjType = TY.BaseType left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal, H.BcgSum, D.DocNum, D.InvoiceId, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, D.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on TX.DocEntry = TZ.DocEntry and TX.ObjType = TZ.InvType where TA.NumAtCard=:4 union select null as 'PO Number', null as 'PO Date', TY.CardCode as 'Supplier Code', TY.CardName as 'Supplier Name', null as 'PO Currency', null as 'Total PO', null as 'BL Number', null as 'BL Date', null as 'GRPO Number', null as 'GRPO Date', null as 'Total GR', null as 'Consignee', null as 'Invoice Number', null as 'Invoice Date', null as 'Invoice Currency', null as 'Total Invoice', TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', Tz.Number_Payment as 'Payment Number', Tz.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', Tz.DocDate 'Payment Date', TZ.BcgSum as'Bank Charges', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Payment', (TY.DocTotal-TY.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due' from ORPC as TY left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal, H.BcgSum, D.DocNum, D.InvoiceId, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, H.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on TY.DocEntry = TZ.DocEntry and TY.ObjType = TZ.InvType ) as ZZ where :1 between ':2' and ':3' and :6 = :7 and ZZ.[Supplier Code] = :5 order by ZZ.[Supplier Code],ZZ.[Payment Number], ZZ.[Sequence] asc

ExpSyntax.val: CASE({0,29}, 'OPOR','ZZ.[PO Date]', 'OPDN','ZZ.[GRPO Date]', 'OPBL','ZZ.[BL Date]', 'OPCH','ZZ.[Invoice Date]', 'ORPC','ZZ.[CN Date]', 'OVPM','ZZ.[Payment Date]', 'ZZ.[Payment Date]')
CASE({0,29}, 'OPOR','ZZ.[PO Number]', 'OPDN','ZZ.[GRPO Number]', 'OPBL','ZZ.[BL Number]', 'OPCH','ZZ.[Invoice Number]', 'ORPC','ZZ.[CN Number]', 'OVPM','ZZ.[Payment Number]', 'ZZ.[Payment Number]')

IF({0,36}='',
CASE({0,29}, 'OPOR','ZZ.[PO Number]', 'OPDN','ZZ.[GRPO Number]', 'OPBL','ZZ.[BL Number]', 'OPCH','ZZ.[Invoice Number]', 'ORPC','ZZ.[CN Number]', 'OVPM','ZZ.[Payment Number]', 'ZZ.[Payment Number]')
,ASCIIChr(39)&Trim({0,36})&ASCIIChr(39))
CASE({0,29}, 'OPOR','Purchase Order', 'OPDN','Puchase Receipt', 'OPBL','BL', 'OPCH','A/P Invoice', 'ORPC','A/P CN', 'OVPM','Outgoing Payment','')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select T3.CardCode as 'Supplier Code', T3.CardName as 'Supplier Name', T3.NumAtCard as 'Supplier Reference', T3.DocNum as 'GRPO Number', T3.DocDate as 'GRPO Date', --TW.DocNum as 'Return Number', --TW.DocDate as 'Return Date', --TW.NumAtCard as 'Return Reference', --TW.DocTotal as 'Total Return', TX.DocNum as 'Invoice Number', TX.DocDate as 'Invoice Date', TX.DocTotal as 'Total Invoice', TX.PaidToDate as 'Paid Amount', (TX.DocTotal - TX.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due', --TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', --TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', --TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', --TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', TZ.Number_Payment as 'Payment Number', TZ.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', TZ.DocDate as 'Payment Date', TZ.BcgSum as'Bank Charges', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Payment' from OPDN as T3 --left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocNum, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.DocDate, A.NumAtCard,A.DocCur, A.DocTotal -- from ORPD as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TW -- on T3.DocEntry = TW.BaseEntry and T3.ObjType = TW.BaseType left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.U_IDU_Kode_PT,A.DocNum, A.DocDate, A.DocCur, A.DocTotal, A.PaidToDate from OPCH as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TX on T3.DocEntry = TX.BaseEntry and T3.ObjType = TX.BaseType --left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocNum, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.DocDate, A.NumAtCard,A.DocCur, A.DocTotal -- from ORPC as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TY -- on TX.DocEntry = TY.BaseEntry and TX.ObjType = TY.BaseType left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal, H.BcgSum, D.DocNum, D.InvoiceId, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, D.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on TX.DocEntry = TZ.DocEntry and TX.ObjType = TZ.InvType where T3.NumAtCard=:4 and :1 between ':2' and ':3' and :6 = :7 and T3.CardCode = :5 order by T3.CardCode,TZ.Number_Payment,TZ.InvoiceId asc

SELECT count(0) as span FROM (select T3.CardCode as 'Supplier Code', T3.CardName as 'Supplier Name', T3.NumAtCard as 'Supplier Reference', T3.DocNum as 'GRPO Number', T3.DocDate as 'GRPO Date', --TW.DocNum as 'Return Number', --TW.DocDate as 'Return Date', --TW.NumAtCard as 'Return Reference', --TW.DocTotal as 'Total Return', TX.DocNum as 'Invoice Number', TX.DocDate as 'Invoice Date', TX.DocTotal as 'Total Invoice', TX.PaidToDate as 'Paid Amount', (TX.DocTotal - TX.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due', --TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', --TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', --TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', --TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', TZ.Number_Payment as 'Payment Number', TZ.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', TZ.DocDate as 'Payment Date', TZ.BcgSum as'Bank Charges', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Payment' from OPDN as T3 --left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocNum, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.DocDate, A.NumAtCard,A.DocCur, A.DocTotal -- from ORPD as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TW -- on T3.DocEntry = TW.BaseEntry and T3.ObjType = TW.BaseType left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.U_IDU_Kode_PT,A.DocNum, A.DocDate, A.DocCur, A.DocTotal, A.PaidToDate from OPCH as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TX on T3.DocEntry = TX.BaseEntry and T3.ObjType = TX.BaseType --left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocNum, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.DocDate, A.NumAtCard,A.DocCur, A.DocTotal -- from ORPC as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TY -- on TX.DocEntry = TY.BaseEntry and TX.ObjType = TY.BaseType left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal, H.BcgSum, D.DocNum, D.InvoiceId, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, D.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on TX.DocEntry = TZ.DocEntry and TX.ObjType = TZ.InvType) as ZZ WHERE zz.[Invoice Number]=':1'

SELECT count(zz.[Payment Number]) as span FROM (select T3.CardCode as 'Supplier Code', T3.CardName as 'Supplier Name', T3.NumAtCard as 'Supplier Reference', T3.DocNum as 'GRPO Number', T3.DocDate as 'GRPO Date', --TW.DocNum as 'Return Number', --TW.DocDate as 'Return Date', --TW.NumAtCard as 'Return Reference', --TW.DocTotal as 'Total Return', TX.DocNum as 'Invoice Number', TX.DocDate as 'Invoice Date', TX.DocTotal as 'Total Invoice', TX.PaidToDate as 'Paid Amount', (TX.DocTotal - TX.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due', --TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', --TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', --TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', --TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', TZ.Number_Payment as 'Payment Number', TZ.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', TZ.DocDate as 'Payment Date', TZ.BcgSum as'Bank Charges', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Payment' from OPDN as T3 --left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocNum, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.DocDate, A.NumAtCard,A.DocCur, A.DocTotal -- from ORPD as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TW -- on T3.DocEntry = TW.BaseEntry and T3.ObjType = TW.BaseType left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.U_IDU_Kode_PT,A.DocNum, A.DocDate, A.DocCur, A.DocTotal, A.PaidToDate from OPCH as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TX on T3.DocEntry = TX.BaseEntry and T3.ObjType = TX.BaseType --left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocNum, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.DocDate, A.NumAtCard,A.DocCur, A.DocTotal -- from ORPC as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TY -- on TX.DocEntry = TY.BaseEntry and TX.ObjType = TY.BaseType left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal, H.BcgSum, D.DocNum, D.InvoiceId, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, D.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on TX.DocEntry = TZ.DocEntry and TX.ObjType = TZ.InvType) as ZZ WHERE zz.[Payment Number]=:1
